title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; install via pip and chat with local models in a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer for Ollama models; use Llama & friends as LangChain LLMs/embeddings.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI); chat, PDF, RAG, admin panel, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama REST API with chat REPL, history, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; simple fluent API, streaming, embeddings, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama REST API; chat, generate, pull models, and stream responses.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, completions, embeddings, and tool calls.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Lightweight C# client for Ollama; targets .NET Standard 2.0 for broad compatibility.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama; idiomatic APIs, streaming, and model utils.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript client; 40k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package for Ollama; 100k+ monthly downloads, supports sync & async.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; slash commands, threads, per-guild config.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that brings local LLMs into your workspace; supports DM, app mentions, and streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC, and ingress.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain; load PDFs and ask questions locally.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles for code, chat, roleplay, and function-calling.
